analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1030-1056):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1041-1044)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1047-1051)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaisedTotal)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1041-1044)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1047-1051)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1030-1056) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1030-1056) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#565-580):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#578-579)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#580)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#413-464):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#421-434)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#435-439)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#456-458)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#455-456)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1082-1103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#1101-1102)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#46-57) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#92-95) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#366-401):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#383-384)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#397-398)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#401)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#384-388)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#395)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#413-464):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#421-434)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#435-439)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#447-449)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#443-446)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#451-452)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#479-500):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#484-486)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#491-492)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#493-494)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#490-491)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#490)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#716-747) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#732-746)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#731-746)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#269-271)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#225-226)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x0e412af67f6c41e9209da8b8638d65bb883ddf5a.sol#252-253)
